  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • createHelix

      public static void createHelix(org.bukkit.entity.Entity target, org.bukkit.Particle.DustOptions options, int per, double radius, double divisor, double iterations, double height, int yOffset)
      Creates a spherical "helix" shape around the target.
      Parameters:
      target - Who to spawn it around
      options - The "dust options" (color and size) of the particles
      per - The particles to spawn per iteration
      radius - NOT actually radius, this is diameter
      divisor - A higher value adds more rings.
      iterations - The number of locations to spawn a particle at.
      height - The height in blocks.
      yOffset - Slightly offsets the rings, useful for animations.

    • createHelix

      public static void createHelix(org.bukkit.entity.Entity target, org.bukkit.Particle.DustOptions options, int per, double radius, double divisor, double iterations, double height, int yOffset, int itsToRun)
      Exact same as the other 'createHelix' function, except it only spawns a certain number of iterations. This means it will only spawn part of the helix.
      Parameters:
      itsToRun - How much of the helix to spawn as a percent will be equal to iterations / itsToRun

    • createHelix

      public static void createHelix(org.bukkit.Location target, org.bukkit.Particle.DustOptions options, int per, double radius, double divisor, double iterations, double height, int yOffset)
      Same as the first createHelix but for a location.

    • charge

      public static void charge(int time, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Color color, org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable onEnd)
      Creates a new chargeup sequence, spawns helixes, and runs onEnd when completed.
      Parameters:
      time - The time in ticks to chargeup (20 ticks = 1 second)
      player - The player to charge up around
      color - The color of the chargeup
      onEnd - What to run when the chargeup finishes.

    • charge

      public static void charge(int chargeupTime, int ticksPerStep, int offsetPerStep, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Particle.DustOptions options, int per, double radius, double divisor, double instances, double height, org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable onEnd)
      A more customizable version of chargeup.
      Parameters:
      chargeupTime - The time in ticks to chargeup (20 ticks = 1 second)
      ticksPerStep - How often to update the helix particles
      offsetPerStep - How much to offset the helix particles (to give the illusion of animation) per step
      player - Who to spawn it around
      options - Color + size
      per - number of particles per instance
      radius - Actually diameter, not radius, in blocks.
      divisor - Higher value = more rings.
      instances - The number of locations to spawn a particle at.
      height - The height of the chargeup
      onEnd - What to run on end.
